function.name: g_option_context_set_summary
function.description:
Adds a string to be displayed in --help output before the list of options. This is typically a summary of the program functionality.
Note that the summary is translated (see set_translate_func(), set_translation_domain()).
Since: 2.14

parameter.name: summary
parameter.parameter_description: a string to be shown in --help output before the list of options

function.name: g_option_context_get_summary
function.description: Returns: the summary See set_summary() for more information

function.name: g_option_context_set_description
function.description:
Adds a string to be displayed in --help output after the list of options. This text often includes a bug reporting address.
Note that the summary is translated (see set_translate_func()).
Since: 2.14

parameter.name: description
parameter.parameter_description: a string to be shown in --help output after the list of options

function.name: g_option_context_get_description
function.description: Returns: the description See set_description() for more information

function.name: g_option_context_set_translation_domain
function.description:
A convenience function to use gettext() for translating user-visible strings.
Since: 2.14
